overview: Based on the Manga by Masahiko Kikuni. This movie is a comedy based on romance consisting of  a compilation of 13 live-action segments along with 18 animated. Love and courage give rise to guess, fear and impatience laugh at dwellings, and the anger of poverty invites melancholy and laughter. Heartbreak Angels is a video that contains all of human emotions.
title: Heartbreak Angels
